title: An edited video of PM Modi clapping on the launch of Chandrayaan-2 falsely shared as him watching ‘Ramayana’ TV series
subtitle: The video is an edited one. In the original video, Modi was watching and clapping during the live telecast of the launch of Chandrayaan-2 by ISRO.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video where Prime Minister Modi is seen clapping is being shared on social media with a claim that he is doing so while watching ‘Ramayana’ TV series. But, FACTLY has found the video to be edited one. In the original video, it can be seen that PM Modi was watching and clapping during the live telecast of the launch of Chandrayaan-2 by ISRO. So, the visuals of the launch of Chandrayaan-2 telecasted on television have been edited to show the visuals of TV series ‘Ramayana’. Earlier, when the same video was shared as PM Modi clapping while watching Chidambaram getting arrested, FACTLY has written a fact-check article, which can be read here. 



Did you watch our new video?
